original: Hallborg, Per Tore Johannes, kyrkoherde, Älmhult, f. 20/8/05 i Växjö av prosten Aron H. o. Sigrid Jacobsson. G. 31 m. Brita Kärrfors. Barn: Ulla f. 32, Karin 34, Ingrid 39, Anders 42, Erik 44. — Stud:ex. i Växjö 23, teol. fil. ex. i Lund 25, teol. kand., prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Växjö .stift 29. Tjg. s. v. kommin. i Tjureda o. Rydaholm, v. pastor i Rydaholm o. Båraryd, stiftsadj. 31-35, tf. kyrkoh. i Smedby 35-38, tf. kommin. i Älmhult 39-40, kyrkoh. där ,sed. 41. Stifts-rådets sekr. 31-35. Utg. av Kyrka o. Hem (kyrkl. mån:bilad f. Växjö .stift) 34-35.
translated: Hallborg, Per Tore Johannes, pastor, Älmhult, born August 20, 1905 in Växjö to the minister Aron H. and Sigrid Jacobsson. Married in 1931 to Brita Kärrfors. Children: Ulla (born 1932), Karin (born 1934), Ingrid (born 1939), Anders (born 1942), Erik (born 1944). He graduated from Växjö in 1923, received a Bachelor of Theology from Lund University in 1925, a Master of Theology, practical theology exam and was ordained as a priest in the Växjö diocese in 1929. He served as a curate in Tjureda and Rydaholm, assistant pastor in Rydaholm and Båraryd, diocesan adjutant from 1931-35, acting vicar in Smedby from 1935-38, acting curate in Älmhult from 1939-40, and pastor there since 1941. He was a secretary of the diocesan council from 1931-35. He published Kyrka o. Hem (Church and Home, a church monthly magazine in Växjö diocese) from 1934-35.

structured.name: Per Tore Johannes Hallborg
structured.description: Per Tore Johannes Hallborg was a Swedish pastor who was born on August 20, 1905 in Växjö to the minister Aron H. and Sigrid Jacobsson. He married Brita Kärrfors in 1931 and had five children. Hallborg earned a Stud:ex from Växjö in 1923, a Bachelor of Theology from Lund University in 1925, a Master of Theology, practical theology exam and was ordained as a priest in the Växjö diocese in 1929. He served as a curate in Tjureda and Rydaholm, assistant pastor in Rydaholm and Båraryd, diocesan adjutant from 1931-35, acting vicar in Smedby from 1935-38, acting curate in Älmhult from 1939-40, and pastor there since 1941. He was a secretary of the diocesan council from 1931-35. He also published Kyrka o. Hem (Church and Home, a church monthly magazine in Växjö diocese) from 1934-35.
